member.name: MF_OBJECT_TYPE
member.summary: Defines the object types that are created by the source resolver.

member.name: MF_OBJECT_TYPE.MF_OBJECT_MEDIASOURCE
member.summary: Media source. You can query the object for the interface.

member.name: MF_OBJECT_TYPE.MF_OBJECT_BYTESTREAM
member.summary: Byte stream. You can query the object for the interface.
